appDescription.message: Lazy-load long ChatGPT conversations by showing only the most recent messages (configurable). Reduces lag on long chats.

hiddenPlaceholderSingular.message: 1 older message hidden — click to load next $1

hiddenPlaceholderPlural.message: $1 older messages hidden — click to load next $2

labelAutoload.message: Reveal older messages automatically when I scroll to the top

labelHideOldest.message: Hide the oldest message when a new appears

hintApply.message: Changes apply instantly to open ChatGPT tabs.

footerDescription.message: $1 reduces lag on long conversations by only keeping a window of messages in the DOM.

footerSupportPrefix.message: If you like this extension consider buying me
